update db_expressapiuser
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTRYCODE = #{countrycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE1 = #{postcode1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TOKEN2 = #{token2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select , from db_expressapiuser where ordertype=#{ordertype} and openflag = 1
